text: and supervised than others. Ask your doctor or other health care professional about good home health care services in your area. Get as much information as possible about a service before you sign an agreement. Also, ask for and check references Here are some questions to ask before signing a home health care agreement. - Is your service licensed and accredited?  - How much do your services cost?  - What is included and not included in your services?  - How many days a week and hours a day will
